akn:section.akn:heading: Amendment or restatement of certificate of organization.

akn:content.akn:p: A certificate of organization may be amended or restated at any time.

To restate its certificate of organization, a limited liability company shall deliver to the Mayor for filing a restatement, designated as such in its heading.
